snippet: Japan racked up a record current account deficit in January, and lowered its growth estimate for the October-December quarter Monday in the latest sign of hardships for the world's third-largest economy....

headline.print_headline: Japan Has Record Deficit, Lowers Growth Estimate
headline.main: Japan Has Record Deficit, Lowers Growth Estimate

lead_paragraph: Japan racked up a record current account deficit in January, and lowered its growth estimate for the October-December quarter Monday in the latest sign of hardships for the world's third-largest economy.
